class.rdfs:comment: The total integer number of bathrooms in some [[Accommodation]], following real estate conventions as [documented in RESO](https://ddwiki.reso.org/display/DDW17/BathroomsTotalInteger+Field): "The simple sum of the number of bathrooms. For example for a property with two Full Bathrooms and one Half Bathroom, the Bathrooms Total Integer will be 3.". See also [[numberOfRooms]].
class.rdfs:label: numberOfBathroomsTotal
